lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur manager Mauricio Pochettino has played down concerns that promising midfielder Dele Alli could buckle under the weight of expectation and has highlighted the maturity shown by 19-year-old this campaign.

headline.print_headline: Pochettino Backs 'Mature' Alli to Handle Pressure
headline.main: Pochettino Backs 'Mature' Alli to Handle Pressure

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur manager Mauricio Pochettino has played down concerns that promising midfielder Dele Alli could buckle under the weight of expectation and has highlighted the maturity shown by 19-year-old this campaign....
